Product Details: {'Brand': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly, Dry', 'Scent': 'Citric and Woody', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.56 x 1.46 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Country of Origin': 'Brazil'}
Review Text: I never thought I’d like bar shampoo this much. I was pleasantly surprised! This shampoo accompanied with their conditioner is a match made in heaven! My hair has never felt more healthy and alive. I just wished the bars were  bigger.
Review Title: Wow!

reference_summary:
Janier Nail Tips and Glue Gel Kit,2 In 1 Nail Glue Base Coat&Top Coat with Long Coffin False Clear Half Cover Fake Nail and UV LED Nail Lamp for Nail Extension DIY Nail Art…
Janier
['1']
{'Brand': 'Janier', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.82 x 3.19 inches; 9.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '750081718188'}
This is a great set. It comes with everything you need minus the gel polish. I especially appreciate the gel glue I prefer that over the other regular nail glue. The lamp however is another story u can only cure 1-2 nails at a time depending on you hand size doesn’t get me wrong it works just fine it’s just that nobody has time to do One nail at a time. I already have a regular side led lamp at home so it wasn’t a deal breaker for this is why I still gave them 5⭐️‘S
Amazing set minus the LED lamp

[[VIDEOID:a85cb1993222ab6477f64f176b1d9758]] Such pretty colors, I love them all!
Gorgeous colors
Hair Tail Tools
Teenitor
{'Material': 'Carbon Fiber', 'Brand': 'Teenitor', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Size': '4 Piece Set', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.7 x 4.33 x 0.47 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
I was just in the market for a hair band remover when I came across this pack I couldn’t pass on it first off the remover works great not more pulling my daughters hair we are both happy about that. The rat tail comb really good quality and the pony helper is new to me But I’ve been looking at YouTube videos and I’m excited to use them and facilitate my hubby’s ponytail skills when I’m not around. Incredible deal with what you get for under 6bucks.
Great deal

LV Levitural

These masks really really do a good job at hydrating and moisturizing my under eyes as well as getting rid of the puffy under eye bags.
Highly moisturizing
Large Silk Scrunchies For Hair - Tara Sartoria Artisan Handmade
Tara Sartoria
{'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Tara Sartoria', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.37 x 3.9 x 0.71 inches; 1.09 Ounces'}
Extremely happy with my silk scrunchies. They are really soft, don’t pull my hair nor leave indentations on hair when taken off from a pulled back in ponytail. Well made and come with a little Travel baggie. I highly recommend this set and the brand as I had already own their silk sleeping mask which was another hit for me.
Really soft

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Passionate about Nail and Hair Care:** Continues to express enthusiasm for DIY nail art and high-quality hair care tools, further solidifying their commitment to personal grooming and self-care.

- **Preference for Gel Formulations:** Maintains a strong favor for gel products in their beauty routine, valuing durability and long-lasting effects.

- **Comprehensive Kits Lover:** Appreciates all-in-one solutions that streamline essential products for nail and hair care, emphasizing convenience and efficiency.

- **Time-Efficiency Focused:** Values the effectiveness of tools and products, seeking options that provide quick and easy application processes, particularly in hair care.

- **High Performance Standards:** Expects exceptional product effectiveness across beauty categories, balancing enthusiasm with realistic evaluations of quality. Recent positive experiences with moisturizing formulations reinforce this standard.

- **Sustainable Product Advocate:** Actively pursues eco-friendly, plastic-free options, demonstrating a commitment to gentle hair care practices that align with sustainable lifestyles.

- **Aesthetic Value:** Shows a strong appreciation for vibrant colors in nail care while exploring stylish and functional hair accessories.

The user has recently discovered a strong affinity for solid shampoo formulations, highlighting their adaptability and openness to innovative hair care solutions that promote health and environmental sustainability. Their routine is now underscored by a balance of practicality, performance, and eco-consciousness.
